CREATETAB_PEER: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS peer (session_id varchar(16) PRIMARY KEY, ip_peer VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL UNIQUE, port_peer INTEGER NOT NULL);
CREATETAB_LOG: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS log (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, session_id VARCHAR(16) NOT NULL, data DATE NOT NULL, ora TIME NOT NULL, operazione VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL);
CREATETAB_FILE: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS file (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, md5_file VARCHAR(32), session_id VARCHAR(16) REFERENCES peer(session_id) ON DELETE CASCADE, filename VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, copia int NOT NULL);
CREATETAB_DOWNLOAD: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS download (session_id VARCHAR(16) REFERENCES peer(session_id) NOT NULL, id_file int REFERENCES file(id) NOT NULL);
